898834093.raceDescription: Self-aware machines built for a long-forgotten war.

2803282938.raceDescription: The Awoken survived the Collapse in deep space. But they were forever changed.

4143670657.itemDescription: Draw from the Void. Light the way.

3399822332.itemDescription: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

554244708.itemDescription: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2402750214.itemDescription: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

1722532281.itemDescription: In our darkest hour, nine Iron Wolves emerged from the ruins.

3012398148.itemDescription: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

3322979578.itemDescription: Tossed upon the seas of war and tragedy.

923499578.itemDescription: Long-range ships designed to patrol the Reef and beyond.

2092342448.itemDescription: To the victor goes the prize.

4158489060.itemDescription: For Ghosts who are forged in battle.

3671454769.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

455941427.itemDescription:
Only for winners.

This item will only be available for purchase during the SRL event.

2026036814.itemDescription: "And that Warlock thought I couldn't do it. Hah!"

21395672.itemDescription: Forge the fury of undying suns.

2170625071.itemDescription: "What's a few broken bones between friends?" —Marcus Ren

419895462.itemDescription: Crucible variant. Preprogrammed with thousands of gripping, shoving, throwing and catching motions.

82944038.itemDescription: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

3910559228.itemDescription: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

825392783.itemDescription: And beneath its branches, the Iron Wolves forged an unbreakable oath.

2897238917.itemDescription: A personal firearm, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

3042333087.itemDescription: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

3367786034.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

4275796006.itemDescription: So long as this sword was whole, the Iron Banner could not be broken.

3658182170.itemDescription: There are flames that even the Darkness cannot extinguish.

1275480032.itemDescription: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

372855005.itemDescription: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

2028036494.itemDescription: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

3841951818.itemDescription: Under a red dawn, the Iron Wolves gathered beneath the Ironwood.

1475134443.itemDescription: A scout rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

99462852.itemDescription: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." —Ikora Rey

3060686468.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

327933423.itemDescription: Eat not of the fruit of this tree.

434908299.bucketDescription: Remnants of lost histories, imbued with rare power.

Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump a second time after leaving the ground.
A grenade that attaches to any surface and emits a torrent of damaging Void Light.
Sprint and Sneak faster, gain Enhanced Tracker and the ability to Mark targets you damage.
Grenade and Smoke effects last twice as long, allowing strong territory control.
Killing tethered targets creates Orbs of Light for your allies.
Throw Smoke to slow and disorient those trapped in its cloud.
Upgrades Double Jump for better directional control while in the air.
Upgrades Double Jump for even greater height.
A grenade that creates a horizontal wall of burning Void Light.
A grenade that creates a Vortex, continually damaging enemies trapped inside.
The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot become traps that stick to surfaces and wait for prey.
Press, to evade.
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, slowing, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.
Throw Smoke to slow and disorient those trapped in its cloud.
Jump a second time after leaving the ground.
Upgrades Double Jump with a third jump.
Tethered enemies explode when killed. Damage to tethered enemies is shared to all.
Fire Shadowshot up to three times. Void Anchors have reduced range.
The Void Anchor has increased range, lasts significantly longer and can tether more targets.
You and allies near Smoke explosions vanish from sight.
Allows Smoke to stick to surfaces, detonating when enemies are near.
Adds a toxin that damages enemies within Smoke.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Killing tethered targets increases Recovery and Armor for you and nearby allies. Stacks up to 5 times.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on maximum battle recovery.
Training focused on all attributes.
